smallArticles.title: Travel
smallArticles.heading: Surfing in Maldives
smallArticles.text: It’s windy. The cool breeze of the ocean. It gives, a sense of beauty, in motion. All is flowing, rushing and tide-And I sit in wonder, dreaming beside.
